data: The thread "Weekly Project Update" presents a weekly status report on a software project.
The thread "Weekly Project Update" communicates completion of the API integration.
The thread "Weekly Project Update" indicates that UX testing has started and is proceeding well.
The thread "Weekly Project Update" contains a commitment to share UX testing results by end of day.
The thread "Weekly Project Update" includes an action item to review UX feedback.
The thread "Weekly Project Update" includes an action item to plan the next sprint.
